nodes.text: The Great Czerka Datacrash was a famous event involving Czerka Corporation that was perpetrated by the freelance spy known as the Shroud sometime prior to the conquest of Makeb in 3638 BBY.
The Great Czerka Datacrash was mentioned in the Codex entry for the Shroud in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion to the 2011 BioWare video game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
